thread.title: Watch Sampha Perform Tracks From ‘Process’ for NPR’s “Tiny Desk Concert”
thread.title_full: Watch Sampha Perform Tracks From ‘Process’ for NPR’s “Tiny Desk Concert”

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Watch Sampha Perform Tracks From ‘Process’ for NPR’s “Tiny Desk Concert”
text:
In continued support of his debut album, Process , Sampha recently stopped by NPR to perform for their “Tiny Desk Concert” series. Appropriately, the British singer-songwriter/producer let loose of intimate renditions of three tracks from the work.
Switching from the keyboard to a traditional piano, Sampha performed “Plastic 100°C,” “(No One Knows Me) Like the Piano,” and “Blood On Me.” 
Press play underneath to check it all out.
